Title: Knowledge is strength - Strive to make sure that within twelve years our nation's most needy scientific institutions can reach the world's advanced levels
Designer: Hu Haichao (胡海超)Zhang Zhimin (章志敏)Zhang Suyu (张苏予)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: The book title: 和平利用原子能 - Peaceful use of atomic energy.This is a print from the third edition (February 1957).
